items.title: Migrate data from Google Drive to Docs
items.description: Easily migrate your Google Drive data, whether it's shared on the personal cloud or shared cloud, to your Lark Docs.

items.title: Import local files as Lark Docs
items.description: Easily import your local files as Lark Docs for a better online collaboration experience.

items.title: Insert a board in Docs
items.description: Design intuitive and visually-striking flowcharts, diagrams, schematics, and more in Docs.

items.title: Draw flowcharts and UML diagrams in Docs
items.description: Create standout flowcharts, UML diagrams, and structural diagrams with ease.

items.title: Docs and Sheets permissions
items.description: Share Docs with external users, adjust other security permissions for the Doc, and transfer the Doc ownership.

items.title: Use formulas and functions in Sheets
items.description: Perform various calculation types by using functions to create formulas in Sheets.
